full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' PO GCIG PA'I SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS RIN CHEN BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' PO GCIG PA'I SGRUB THABS RGYUN 'KHYER DU BYA BA'I TSUL MDOR BSDUS PA RIN CHEN BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,RANG GZHAN DU MA LA NYE BAR MKHO BAR MTHONG NAS, ,PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I DPA' GCIG GI SGRUB THABS DE NYID GZHIR BZHAG STE NAG PO 'GRO SHES KYI TSUL DU BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SNGAGS RAM PA CHOS 'DZIN DAR RGYAS SO, ,)
